column5: My muskie rod and reel ended up in the lake for 2min. Fortunately the cork handle kept it afloat.Â  	Is my reel ok or does it need some first aid? Â  	I'm not very good with opening up things with a lot of parts and springs. ðŸ™„
Put it in zip-loc with a cup of uncooked rice for a day or two, should be fine.  	PS.....set the zip-loc in a sunny location.
Reels are meant to get wet Â  Â I'd let it dry out in the sun and fish it.
